mapper.insert: insert into article_comment(article_id, user_account_id, content, created_at) values (#{articleComment.articleId}, #{articleComment.userAccountId}, #{articleComment.content}, #{articleComment.createdAt});
mapper.select: select ac.id, u.name, ac.content, ac.created_at from article_comment ac join user_account u on ac.user_account_id = u.login_id where ac.article_id = #{articleId} order by created_at desc
